name: @posey.ai/posey
description: Monorepo for the Posey AI project
author: Posey Labs <code@posey.ai>

scripts.build:local: echo 'ðŸ”¨ Building Docker image posey-cron:latest...' && docker build -t posey-cron:latest -f Dockerfile ../.. && docker images posey-cron:latest
scripts.k8s:check: kubectl cluster-info > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Error: Kubernetes cluster not accessible. Please ensure:'; echo '1. Kubernetes is running (minikube, kind, etc.)'; echo '2. kubectl is configured correctly'; echo '3. Your VPN is connected if using a remote cluster'; exit 1)
scripts.deploy:local: yarn build:local && yarn k8s:check && kubectl apply -f ./k8s/service.yaml -n posey && kubectl apply -f ./k8s/deployment-local.yaml -n posey
scripts.verify: kubectl get pods -n posey -l app=posey-cron && kubectl get services -n posey -l app=posey-cron
